body:
LEVI DAO 签署禁止在海洋底床及其下层土壤放置核武器及其他大规模毁灭武器条约

LEVI DAO signs a treaty banning the placement of nuclear weapons and other weapons of mass destruction on the bottom of the ocean and its underlying soil

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/A-RES-2660(XXV).shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
